title: Default `/` route to Sign-In screen with “Welcome to EOA” and post-login redirect

requirements.summary: Change the `/` (index) route to render a dedicated sign-in page instead of the current Home/Landing page while keeping all other routes unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When a user visits `/`, the app shows a sign-in page (not the current Home/Landing page).
All other existing routes (e.g., `/trip-builder`, `/saved`, `/memory-finder`, `/groups`, `/profile`) remain unchanged and reachable via navigation or direct URL.

file_operations.description: Update the TanStack Router index route (`/`) to render the new dedicated SignInPage component instead of HomePage, without changing any other route paths.
Create a dedicated sign-in page component for `/` that displays the unauthenticated sign-in UI (reuse the existing UnauthSignInScreen component) and serves as the new default first screen.

requirements.summary: Ensure the `/` sign-in page shows the exact heading "Welcome to EOA", starts Internet Identity login via a Sign In button, and redirects to `/profile` after successful login.
acceptanceCriteria: The sign-in page at `/` visibly displays the heading text exactly: "Welcome to EOA".
No extra or garbled characters appear in the welcome heading text.
Clicking "Sign In" on the `/` page initiates Internet Identity login.
After a successful login from the `/` page, the user is navigated to `/profile`.

file_operations.description: Implement sign-in behavior using the existing Internet Identity hook (per the selected "authorization" component guidance). Render UnauthSignInScreen (which already includes the exact "Welcome to EOA" heading and a Sign In button that calls `login`), and add a redirect to `/profile` when authentication becomes available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
